exp_replicat.node: The replicate strategies used. Typically these terms should come from the Experimental Factor Ontology. See for example the list of replicate terms.(https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/efo/terms?short_form=EFO_0000683)
The source of the Replicat Type terms; this must reference one of the Term Source Names defined in the IDF file.
The accession number for this term, taken from the indicated Term Source.
